name: Bohemia
description: '''Roger David''' ({{langx|pa|{{nq|راجر ڈیوڈ}}}}, {{IPA|pa|ɾaːd͡ʒəɾ ɖeːʋɪɖ|pron}}; born 15 October 1979), better known by his stage name '''Bohemia''', is a [[Pakistani Americans|Pakistani-American]] singer-songwriter and record producer, mainly associated with [[Punjabi music|Punjabi]] [[Hip-hop|hip-hop music]]. He is considered to be one of the pioneers of the [[Desi hip hop]] industry.
